channel.title: Eline Kraaijenvanger - Het Parool on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate
channel.description: Recent content in Eline Kraaijenvanger - Het Parool on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate

item.title: Waarom roddelen essentieel is voor ons sociale leven
item.description: Interview with Eline Kraaijenvanger about my work on how gossip and reputation in everyday can promote cooperation published in Dutch newspaper ‘Het Parool’.
